strapiPost.title: Christmas Coming to TheatreSquared
strapiPost.content:
Christmas activities and shows are happening left and right, and we canâ€™t get enough. 

  • Contemporary: Arkansas native and University of Arkansas alumnus, Rob Sutton, created an original Christmas show and is performing it at TheatreSquared starting on Dec. 14. The show is called The Heart of Christmas: Songs and Stories of the Season and is a nostalgic look at past seasons as well as a celebration of resilience and hope. Tickets are $41.
  • Classic: Starting tomorrow, TheatreSquared cast and crew will also be putting on A Christmas Carol at the Fayetteville Public Library. In-person and streaming tickets are available starting at $20.

For more information and tickets click HERE and HERE.
